original_text: God raised Jesus and he put him in the most important place at his right side. Jesus is now the one who leads us and the one who saves us. He has made a way for the people of Israel to turn back to God. He wants us to stop doing wrong things. Then God will forgive us for our sins.
korean_text: 이스라엘에게 회개함과 죄 사함을 주시려고 그를 오른손으로 높이사 임금과 구주로 삼으셨느니라

sentences.original_text: and he put him in the most important place
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 예수님을 가장 중요한 곳에 두셨습니다

sentences.original_text: Jesus is now the one who leads us
and the one who saves us
for the people of Israel to turn back to God
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 하나님께 돌아갈 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: He wants us to stop doing wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서는 우리가 잘못된 것들을 그치기를 원하십니다

sentences.original_text: Then God will forgive us for our sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님께서 우리의 죄를 용서해 주실 것입니다
